title: Project Lifecycle Management in Hyundai Mobis
subTitle: Customised PLM solution to support project planning and execution
overviewContent: Contributed to the implementation of the Project Lifecycle Management (PLM) system at Hyundai Mobis by customising the Enovia solution. Developed key components including Bills of Materials (BOM) and Engineering Orders (EO), ensuring the system supports project planning, execution, and monitoring effectively.

jd: Analysed the Enovia framework of Dassault Systèmes.
Developed Bill Of Materials (BOM) and Engineering Orders (EO) by customising the Enovia solution.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
Assisted in writing technical documentation and end-user manuals.
